text.section: A corporation, limited liability company, or partnership may apply to the commissioner for and obtain a certificate of authority to establish and operate a health maintenance organization in compliance with this subtitle.

Health maintenance organizations which are corporations may be organized by applying the provisions of KRS Chapter 271B, if for profit, and KRS Chapter 273, if for nonstock, nonprofit, to the extent that the same are not inconsistent with the express provisions of this subtitle.
